text: Junction – AI-Powered Legal Assistance Platform Tools: FastAPI, React, FAISS, Llama3, SQLite, RAG ◦ Developed an intelligent multilingual legal chatbot (English, Hindi, Marathi) to improve accessibility to Indian legal guidance. ◦ Employed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with FAISS and Llama3 to deliver accurate, context-aware legal responses. ◦ Enabled secure legal document uploads and automated summarization using NLP techniques. ◦ Designed a scalable, high-performance architecture with FastAPI
